sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { useState } from "react";
import BootstrapTable from "react-bootstrap-table-next";
import {
  Card,
  Button,
  Container,
  Pagination,
  Badge,
  Form,
  Dropdown,
  Row,
  Col,
} from "react-bootstrap";
import AddProject from "./AddProject";

const ProjectDashboard = () => {
  const [show, setShow] = useState(false);
  const handleShow = () => setShow(true);
  const handleClose = () => setShow(false);

  const columns = [
    {
      dataField: "projectActiveStatus",
      text: "",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "projectDueStatus",
      text: "",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "projectCode",
      text: "Code",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "pName",
      text: "Project Name",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "cName",
      text: "Client Name",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "projectStatus",
      text: "Status",
      sort: true,
    },
    {
      dataField: "projectTeam",
      text: "Team",
    },
    {
      dataField: "projectOptions",
      text: "",
    },
  ];

  const defaultSorted = [{
    dataField: 'projectCode',
    order: 'incr' //desc
  }];
  


  const projectData = [
    {
      projectActiveStatus: <Badge bg="success">Active</Badge>,
      projectDueStatus: <Badge bg="info">Soon Due</Badge>,
      projectCode: 1,
      pName: "BI Software",
      cName: "XYZ",
      projectStatus: "Started",
      projectTeam: "BP",
      projectOptions: <Dropdown>
      <Dropdown.Toggle id="options-menu" variant="secondary">
        Options
      </Dropdown.Toggle>

      <Dropdown.Menu variant="dark">
        <Dropdown.Item href="" active>
          Edit
        </Dropdown.Item>
        <Dropdown.Item href="">Delete</Dropdown.Item>
      </Dropdown.Menu>
    </Dropdown>,
    },
    {
      projectActiveStatus: <Badge bg="success">Active</Badge>,
      projectDueStatus: <Badge bg="info">Soon Due</Badge>,
      projectCode: 2,
      pName: "BL Software",
      cName: "ABC",
      projectStatus: "Started",
      projectTeam: "BP",
      projectOptions: <Dropdown>
      <Dropdown.Toggle id="options-menu" variant="secondary">
        Options
      </Dropdown.Toggle>

      <Dropdown.Menu variant="dark">
        <Dropdown.Item href="" active>
          Edit
        </Dropdown.Item>
        <Dropdown.Item href="">Delete</Dropdown.Item>
      </Dropdown.Menu>
    </Dropdown>,
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Container>
      <Card style={{ width: "100%" }}>
        <Card.Header as="h4">
          PROJECTS
          <Button
            variant="success"
            className="float-end"
            id="addProject"
            onClick={handleShow}
          >
            + Add Project
          </Button>
          <Card.Text className="float-end"> </Card.Text>
          <Button
            variant="danger"
            className="float-end"
            id="deleteProjects"
            disabled={true}
          >
            Delete Selected
          </Button>
        </Card.Header>
        <Card.Body>
          <Card.Text>
            Show  
            <Dropdown className="d-inline">
              <Dropdown.Toggle variant="outline-secondary">5</Dropdown.Toggle>
              <Dropdown.Menu>
                <Dropdown.Item href="#">5</Dropdown.Item>
                <Dropdown.Item href="#">10</Dropdown.Item>
                <Dropdown.Item href="#">20</Dropdown.Item>
              </Dropdown.Menu>
            </Dropdown>
              entries
            <Form className="float-end">
              <Form.Group
                as={Row}
                className="mb-3"
                controlId="formHorizontalSearchm"
              >
                <Form.Label column sm={4}>
                        Search :
                </Form.Label>
                <Col sm={8}>
                  <Form.Control type="text" />
                </Col>
              </Form.Group>
            </Form>
          </Card.Text>
          <BootstrapTable
            keyField="projectCode"
            data={projectData}
            columns={columns}
            hover
            selectRow={ { mode: 'checkbox' } }
            defaultSorted = {defaultSorted}
            noDataIndication="No data available in table"
          />
          Showing 1 to 1 of 1 entries
          <Pagination className="float-end">
            <Pagination.Prev />
            <Pagination.Item active>{1}</Pagination.Item>
            <Pagination.Next />
          </Pagination>
        </Card.Body>
        <AddProject show={show} onHide={handleClose} />
      </Card>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default ProjectDashboard;
